ygData.subject: Re: Mermaids and other water mysteries
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm, the sirens in OOT look an awful lot like mermaids, which would not be a good thing to meet just swimming around S Qeynos I would think. ... From: Ward
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm, the sirens in OOT look an awful lot like mermaids, which would not be
a good thing to meet just swimming around S Qeynos I would think.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ward Family [mailto:jajward@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 12:04 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Mermaids and other water mysteries


From: "Ward Family" <jajward@...>

I too swear I saw a mermaid while swimming in South Qeynos waiting for the
boat. It was certainly not a shark. Yet when I swam to where it was, there
was nothing there (I was to dumb or dumbfounded to /con it). I have asked
many if they had seen one, but people kept saying that there are none in the
game. While I have yet to go all "Ahab" and devote my life to hunting one
down, it is nice to hear I am not alone in this rare sighting.

Also, has anyone ever swam to the bottom of the lake in West Commonlands? I
swam to the bottom and was teleported to the zone wall it shares with East
Commonlands. The text sayed that I was being moved to a safe place or
something like that. It has happened repeatedly and I swear that I saw
something down there too, though, alas I do not recall the /loc of the
object.

This list is a wonderful source of information, but it took another mermaid
sighting to get me to leave Lurkerville.

Cleaver
Fennin Ro
